snippet.title: TRIALS® RISING : POST-LAUNCH TRAILER
snippet.description:
Trials Rising is coming February 26th and this is just the beginning.
We’ll be rolling out new features and content over the first year of Trials,
including an Expansion Pass with two major DLCs, Customization Packs, and also Events and Seasons.


PRE-ORDER NOW
AND GET TWO ADDITIONAL CUSTOMISATION PACKS

Visit our official channels for the latest info on Trials Rising: 
https://trialsgame.com
https://www.facebook.com/trials.official
https://twitter.com/TrialsGames
http://www.youtube.com/user/UbisoftGB
